name: Waltzing Matilda Sunset Cruise
description: Set sail from Airlie Beach on a serene sunset tour aboard the Waltzing Matilda. This experience offers a front-row seat to nature's masterpiece, with panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach. The spacious and comfortable deck area makes it perfect for solo travelers, groups, couples, families, and friends seeking a tranquil escape. Relax with a complimentary glass of bubbles and nibbles as you witness the enchanting beauty of the Whitsundays Islands at sunset.
includes:
One complimentary glass of bubbles
Spacious and comfortable deck area
All inclusive (nothing extra to pay)
Panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach
highlights:
Sail through Pioneer Bay
Marvel at the breathtaking sunset over the ocean
Relax with a drink and nibbles
Available every Friday and Saturday
A camera to capture the incredible sunset
Sunglasses for when you set off
Rain jacket (if needed)
ideal_for: Solo travelers, groups, couples, families, and friends seeking a tranquil escape.

name: Whitsunday Pearl
description: Experience a luxurious escape aboard the Whitsunday Pearl, a stylish catamaran offering an intimate sailing adventure. Perfect for those who seek privacy and comfort, this tour allows you to explore the most scenic locations and least crowded beaches in the Whitsundays. With a fully crewed vessel, guests can relax and enjoy the journey, making it ideal for couples, families, and small groups. The onboard amenities, including private ensuites and spacious decks, ensure a comfortable and memorable experience.
includes:
Fully crewed with skipper and hostess
Snorkelling gear: mask, snorkel, wetsuit, and floatation devices
All marine park fees
Visits to Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef snorkelling
Intimate group sailing with 8 guests
Lagoon 450 vessel, 14 meters in length and 8 meters in width
Four stylish double cabins with private ensuites
Stand-up paddle boards
Solar panels to power onboard appliances
Wifi onboard powered by Starlink
Charcoal filtered drinking water
Onboard ice maker and coffee machine
BYO alcohol and drinks
highlights:
Comfort and privacy aboard a stylish catamaran
Explore the most scenic locations and least crowded beaches
Relaxed sailing experience with a fully crewed vessel
Intimate group size for a personalized experience
Onboard amenities including private ensuites and spacious decks
ideal_for: Couples, families, and small groups seeking a private and comfortable sailing adventure in the Whitsundays.

name: Summer Jo 3D/3N
description: Experience the Whitsundays in unparalleled luxury aboard Summer Jo, a mega yacht that has recently undergone a stunning $1 million makeover. This tour is perfect for solo adventure-seekers, friend groups, and families with older children. Explore the iconic Whitsunday hotspots, including the enchanting Whitehaven Beach and the mesmerizing depths of the Great Barrier Reef. Dive enthusiasts will love the free scuba experience and multiple snorkeling opportunities. Enjoy mouthwatering meals prepared by our onboard chef and relax in private, air-conditioned cabins with ensuite facilities. With spacious decks for socializing and a dedicated Dive Master onboard, you're in expert hands for your diving adventures.
includes:
All meals (unless gluten-free, vegan or dairy-free meals are required)
Snorkelling equipment, including masks and snorkels
Unlimited hot showers
Diving equipment (diving can be decided and paid for on board)
BYO Vessel – no glass, no red wine
highlights:
Luxurious mega yacht with a $1 million makeover
Explore Whitehaven Beach and the Great Barrier Reef
Free scuba diving experience
Private, air-conditioned cabins with ensuite facilities
Mouthwatering meals prepared by an onboard chef
Multiple snorkelling locations
Spacious decks for socializing
Dedicated Dive Master onboard
Locally owned vessel

ideal_for: Solo adventure-seekers, friend groups, families with older children

name: Solway Lass 3D/2N
description: Step aboard Solway Lass, a beautifully preserved tall ship with a rich history, offering leisurely sailing tours around the Whitsunday Islands. With expansive deck space, a licensed bar, and air-conditioned cabins, guests can enjoy comfort and adventure. Experience the thrill of a rope swing, stand-up paddleboarding, and helping to set the sails. Ideal for backpackers and adventure seekers, this journey promises unforgettable memories amidst stunning beaches, coral reefs, and tranquil sunrises.
includes:
- Services of skipper and crew
- All meals and snacks
- Tap water, tea, and coffee
- Bath towel
- Stand-up paddleboards
- Snorkelling equipment and basic tuition
- Stinger suit
- All marina levies
highlights:
Sail aboard a historic tall ship
Expansive deck space and licensed bar
Air-conditioned cabins
Rope swing and stand-up paddleboards
Help set the sails and take the helm
Stunning beaches and coral reefs
Sunset views and starry nights
Communal meals with fellow travelers
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hook Island,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- Arrive at Whitehaven Beach South for beach activities or relaxation
- Anchorage at Whitehaven Beach for sunset
**Day 2:**
- Breakfast with Whitehaven Beach as backdrop
- Paddleboarding, beach games, or walk to lookout
- Lunch onboard, sail to Hook Island
- Afternoon snorkel and sunset dinner
**Day 3:**
- Sail across Whitsunday Passage
- Arrive back at Airlie Beach

- Cooked Meats, Wraps, Coleslaw and Salad (V: Kofta / Falafel)

- Build your own Burgers (V: Vego Burgers)

- Baked Parmesan Fish with Potato Salad (V: Vegetarian “fish”)
- Fruit Cake with Custard
- Cereals, Yoghurt, Fruit Bread, Spreads, Tea and Coffee
- Beef Tacos (V: TVP)
- Sunset Platter – Cheeses, Dips and Crackers, Vegetable Crudités

name: Siska 2D/1N
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard Siska, a classic sailing yacht designed for social adventures. With its roomy interior and ample seating, Siska offers a fun and youthful atmosphere perfect for making new friends. Enjoy stunning sunsets, guided bush walks, and snorkeling over vibrant coral reefs. Ideal for those with limited time who want to explore the iconic Whitsunday Islands and connect with fellow travelers.
includes:
Services of skipper and crew
All meals and snacks
Tap water, tea, and coffee
Snorkeling equipment and basic tuition
Stinger suit
All bed linen
highlights:
Sailing adventure on a classic yacht
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet Lookout
Visit to Whitehaven Beach
Snorkeling over fringing coral reefs
Ample seating and open-plan accommodation
Evening sunset drinks and snacks
Freshly prepared meals using local ingredients

name: Prima 2D/1N
description: Prima offers a unique and intimate sailing adventure around the Whitsundays, perfect for families, small groups, and romantic getaways. Experience the idyllic beauty of the islands aboard a comfortable vessel designed for small-group charters. With its spacious saloon and dining area, shaded deck, and cushioned sunbathing area, Prima ensures a relaxing and personalized journey. Explore secluded bays, snorkel in vibrant underwater worlds, and enjoy freshly prepared meals using locally sourced ingredients. This adventure is ideal for those seeking a balance of soft adventure and relaxation amidst stunning natural beauty.
includes:
Services of skipper and crew
All meals and snacks
Tap water, tea and coffee
Snorkelling equipment and basic tuition
Entry/Admission – Whitehaven Beach
Entry/Admission – Hill Inlet
Entry/Admission – Whitsunday Islands
Transfers to/from the marina
Bath towel, stinger suit, and all bed linen
highlights:
Small-group sailing adventure
Comfortable vessel with plenty of seating
Shaded deck and cushioned sunbathing area
Visit to Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet
Snorkelling opportunities with equipment provided
Freshly prepared meals using local ingredients
BYO policy for drinks
Private and open-plan accommodation options
price_tiers: Single Bunk: A$516.06 | Double Bed Only: A$1,098 (for 2 people) | Private Double Cabin Ensuite: A$1,156.20 | Private Double Cabin Ensuite: A$1,291.56 (for 2 people)
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Hook Island,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
Find anchorage in a secluded bay for a chance to jump in for a snorkel; meet the underwater life, try and find Nemo, maybe even bump into a turtle. Then be taken to your overnight anchorage in one of the many bays on Hook Island. Enjoy sunset snacks and a drink and talk about the day with your new friends before dinner is served. Take a seat on deck and view the constellations above you before heading to bed.
menu:
**Day 1 Menu:**
- Donuts, Tea, and Coffee
- Pesto Pasta Salad, Tuna Salad, Cooked Meats, Deconstructed Salad, and Wraps
**Day 2 Menu:**

- (Vegetarian Option: Marinated Tofu)

**Lunch:**

- (Vegetarian Option: Vegetarian Burger Patties)
ideal_for: Families, small groups, romantic getaways, and soft adventure seekers

name: Whitsunday Getaway 2D/2N
description: Experience the Whitsundays in comfort aboard the stylish catamaran Whitsunday Getaway. This intimate small-group adventure is perfect for couples seeking a romantic getaway or anyone looking for a relaxing sailing experience. Enjoy the luxury of a fully crewed vessel, with a skipper and hostess taking you to the most scenic and serene locations. Whether you're a seasoned sailor or a beginner, you're welcome to try your hand at sailing or simply relax with a drink and soak in the stunning island scenery. Discover the beauty of Whitehaven Beach and the vibrant underwater world of the northern Whitsunday Islands, making memories that will last a lifetime.
includes:
Skipper and hostess
Gourmet meals
Snorkeling equipment
Stand-up paddleboarding
Guided bush walk
Continental breakfast
highlights:
Sailing through surreal island scenery
Visiting Whitehaven Beach
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet lookout
Snorkeling vibrant underwater world
Stand-up paddleboarding
Relaxing on a spacious deck
price_tiers: Private Double Cabin Ensuite: A$1405.30 (for 2 people)
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- Arrive at Coral Sea Marina South at 2:30 pm
- Safety briefing and begin sailing
- Pre-dinner drinks and gourmet meal onboard
- Relax and enjoy the tranquility of the evening
**Day 2:**
- Continental breakfast
- Sail to Whitehaven Beach
- Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet lookout
- Buffet lunch onboard
- Snorkeling in the northern Whitsunday Islands
- Evening anchorage and reflection
**Day 3:**
- Final breakfast onboard
- Opportunity for last snorkel or stand-up paddleboarding
- Sail back to Airlie Beach
- Return to Coral Sea Marina South

name: Summer Jo 2D/2N
description: Experience the Whitsundays in luxury aboard the newly refitted mega yacht, Summer Jo. This tour offers an action-packed journey filled with snorkeling, diving, and exploring the breathtaking Whitsundays. Perfect for couples, families, divers, and small groups seeking adventure and comfort, you'll dive into vibrant coral reefs and visit world-famous locations like Whitehaven Beach. Enhance your journey by completing an Advanced Dive Course onboard, making this a truly unforgettable experience.
departure_times: Departs Mondays and Wednesdays at 4 pm, Returns Wednesdays and Fridays at 2 pm
includes:
Luxury accommodation aboard the mega yacht
Snorkeling and diving equipment
Advanced Dive Course option
All meals and snacks
Visit to Whitehaven Beach and other Whitsunday locations
highlights:
Luxurious accommodation on a newly refitted mega yacht
Social, action-packed journey with snorkeling and diving
Visit to Whitehaven Beach and other stunning Whitsunday locations
Option to complete an Advanced Dive Course onboard
Breathtaking sunsets and vibrant coral reefs
